creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to your new Pet Shop simulator! Build your own pet store and take care of cute animals as clients check in to your place, in this pet shop game for kids of all ages! Play with, care for, feed, wash, groom and dress up little cats and dogs to maximize happiness and grow your animal care business! My Virtual Pet Shop is amazing fun, play now!

Take good care of the virtual pets to advance levels and earn coins by the end of day. Unlock new animal items and use coins to improve your shop and customize all the items of your pet store to give it the look of your dreams!

MINI GAMES
Exciting mini games will add even more fun to your days in this virtual pet shop simulator story!
★ Wash the Pet - Grab the sponge and some animal shampoo to clean the dirty pets
★ Dress Up! - Put on cute animal items to give pets a special look in your shop
★ Tap the Fleas - Pick off all these tiny nasty bugs from the pets

HIGHLIGHTS
★ Four different activities: pet grooming, pet doctor, pet bath, pet dressing
★ Simple simulator gameplay for pet lovers of all ages
★ Upgradeable items: improve your shop to grow your business and write your success story!
★ Cute virtual kittens and puppies of all breeds
★ Fast-paced fun with challenging animal mini games
★ Beautiful illustrations and animations

If you love animals and store simulator games, you’ll love My Virtual Pet Shop!
Download now and start having fun with your own story filled with cute little pets -- and Doge too!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: Play with, care for, feed, wash, groom and dress up pets in My Virtual Pet Shop!

container.value:

Rua Sapetuba 166

Brazil

creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to your new Pet Shop simulator! Build your own pet store and take care of cute animals as clients check in to your place, in this pet shop game for kids of all ages! Play with, care for, feed, wash, groom and dress up little cats and dogs to maximize happiness and grow your animal care business! My Virtual Pet Shop is amazing fun, play now!

Take good care of the virtual pets to advance levels and earn coins by the end of day. Unlock new animal items and use coins to improve your shop and customize all the items of your pet store to give it the look of your dreams!

MINI GAMES
Exciting mini games will add even more fun to your days in this virtual pet shop simulator story!
★ Wash the Pet - Grab the sponge and some animal shampoo to clean the dirty pets
★ Dress Up! - Put on cute animal items to give pets a special look in your shop
★ Tap the Fleas - Pick off all these tiny nasty bugs from the pets

HIGHLIGHTS
★ Four different activities: pet grooming, pet doctor, pet bath, pet dressing
★ Simple simulator gameplay for pet lovers of all ages
★ Upgradeable items: improve your shop to grow your business and write your success story!
★ Cute virtual kittens and puppies of all breeds
★ Fast-paced fun with challenging animal mini games
★ Beautiful illustrations and animations

If you love animals and store simulator games, you’ll love My Virtual Pet Shop!
Download now and start having fun with your own story filled with cute little pets -- and Doge too!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Play with, care for, feed, wash, groom and dress up little cats and dogs to maximize happiness and grow your animal care business! My Virtual Pet Shop is amazing fun, play now!

Take good care of the virtual pets to advance levels and earn coins by the end of day. Unlock new animal items and use coins to improve your shop and customize all the items of your pet store to give it the look of your dreams!

MINI GAMES
Exciting mini games will add even more fun to your days in this virtual pet shop simulator story!
★ Wash the Pet - Grab the sponge and some animal shampoo to clean the dirty pets
★ Dress Up! - Put on cute animal items to give pets a special look in your shop
★ Tap the Fleas - Pick off all these tiny nasty bugs from the pets

HIGHLIGHTS
★ Four different activities: pet grooming, pet doctor, pet bath, pet dressing
★ Simple simulator gameplay for pet lovers of all ages
★ Upgradeable items: improve your shop to grow your business and write your success story!
★ Cute virtual kittens and puppies of all breeds
★ Fast-paced fun with challenging animal mini games
★ Beautiful illustrations and animations

If you love animals and store simulator games, you’ll love My Virtual Pet Shop!
Download now and start having fun with your own story filled with cute little pets -- and Doge too!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you love animal games? So, download now My Virtual Pet Shop to take care of fluffy dogs and cats! Join 630k animal lovers on the best puppy pet care games for kids!


Welcome to your new pet shop! Build your own pet store and take care of cute animals while customers visit your shop. Play, groom, feed, bathe, groom and dress up kittens and puppies to keep the dogs and cats happy! My Virtual Pet Shop is so much fun, play now!

This pet cares game is very exciting, if you love dogs and cats, My Virtual Pet Shop by Tapps Games is made especially for you! Take good care of cute animals and show them how much you love them!

By taking great care of the cute animals in your pet shop, you'll level up and earn lots of coins at the end of every day. With these coins, unlock items and improve your virtual animals store, customize your tools to take even better care of the dogs and cats, and make your customers very happy!

My Virtual Pet Shop Game by Tapps Games is one of the cutest games you will ever play! Get ready to see cute kittens and puppies from all kinds of breeds and show how much you love cute animals!

ANIMAL CARE CUTE GAMES
Fun and cute games to take care of dogs, cats and all animals, this game will make your days at my pet shop even more exciting. You’ll simply adore this cat and dog game.

★ Wash the puppies and kittens in your professional bathtub – Grab a sponge, some shampoo and with lots of love, wash every pet that comes to your animal store.
★ Play Dress Up – Make dogs and cats super stylish by accessorizing them with cute accessories! They are going to be so cute!
★ Eliminate fleas from the puppies and kittens – Eliminate these insects from your dogs and cats to guarantee them plenty of comfort.

HIGHLIGHTS IN THIS CAT AND DOG GAME
This vet game has many fun activities to take care of animals, but among them, these are the highlights:
★ Four different activities to take care of the pets: animal spa, dress up the animals, bathe and groom the animals in your pet salon.
★ Play this pet cares game in a simple way: this animal game is very easy to play, you just need to LOVE pet games and take good care of all animals, cats, dogs, kittens and puppies!
★ Upgradable Items: Upgrade my pet shop by earning daily coins and buying better equipment.
★ The fun in my virtual pet shop is fast-paced and challenging: play dog and cat mini games and become a real pet salon and vet owner.

A VET CUTE GAME
In my virtual pet shop, you won't just make animals cute, did you know that? From your ninth day of playing my virtual pet, you can be a veterinarian! Apply vaccines, medicines and make sure the animals are in great health condition! You’ll nurse dogs, cats, puppies and kittens back to health.

LEVELS IN THIS CAT AND DOG GAME
Be prepared for new challenges as you'll start serving more demanding clients and taking care of multiple animals at the same time! Can you handle it?

Heads up! This cute game by Tapps Games is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extra items mentioned in the description can also be purchased for real money.

creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you love animal games? So, download now My Virtual Pet Shop to take care of fluffy dogs and cats! Join 820k animal lovers on the best puppy pet care games for kids!


Welcome to your new pet shop! Build your own pet store and take care of cute animals while customers visit your shop. Play, groom, feed, bathe, groom and dress up kittens and puppies to keep the dogs and cats happy! My Virtual Pet Shop is so much fun, play now!

This pet cares game is very exciting, if you love dogs and cats, My Virtual Pet Shop by Tapps Games is made especially for you! Take good care of cute animals and show them how much you love them!

By taking great care of the cute animals in your pet shop, you'll level up and earn lots of coins at the end of every day. With these coins, unlock items and improve your virtual animals store, customize your tools to take even better care of the dogs and cats, and make your customers very happy!

My Virtual Pet Shop Game by Tapps Games is one of the cutest games you will ever play! Get ready to see cute kittens and puppies from all kinds of breeds and show how much you love cute animals!

ANIMAL CARE CUTE GAMES
Fun and cute games to take care of dogs, cats and all animals, this game will make your days at my pet shop even more exciting. You’ll simply adore this cat and dog game.

★ Wash the puppies and kittens in your professional bathtub – Grab a sponge, some shampoo and with lots of love, wash every pet that comes to your animal store.
★ Play Dress Up – Make dogs and cats super stylish by accessorizing them with cute accessories! They are going to be so cute!
★ Eliminate fleas from the puppies and kittens – Eliminate these insects from your dogs and cats to guarantee them plenty of comfort.

HIGHLIGHTS IN THIS CAT AND DOG GAME
This vet game has many fun activities to take care of animals, but among them, these are the highlights:
★ Four different activities to take care of the pets: animal spa, dress up the animals, bathe and groom the animals in your pet salon.
★ Play this pet cares game in a simple way: this animal game is very easy to play, you just need to LOVE pet games and take good care of all animals, cats, dogs, kittens and puppies!
★ Upgradable Items: Upgrade my pet shop by earning daily coins and buying better equipment.
★ The fun in my virtual pet shop is fast-paced and challenging: play dog and cat mini games and become a real pet salon and vet owner.

A VET CUTE GAME
In my virtual pet shop, you won't just make animals cute, did you know that? From your ninth day of playing my virtual pet, you can be a veterinarian! Apply vaccines, medicines and make sure the animals are in great health condition! You’ll nurse dogs, cats, puppies and kittens back to health.

LEVELS IN THIS CAT AND DOG GAME
Be prepared for new challenges as you'll start serving more demanding clients and taking care of multiple animals at the same time! Can you handle it?

Heads up! This cute game by Tapps Games is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extra items mentioned in the description can also be purchased for real money.
